alert.note: Alert for Cumberland (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 11:38AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cumberland County through 1215 PM CDT... At 1138 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fairfield Glade, or 8 miles east of Crossville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crossville, Fairfield Glade, Crab Orchard, Pleasant Hill, Lake Tansi and Cumberland Mountain State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 315 and 339. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
